other_tests.findings: Tissue edema, necrosis, glial activation, and lymphocyte infiltration were noted, with no viral inclusions or microorganisms.
Positive immunostaining for viral proteins in brain cells from the squirrel and Patient 1.
Bornavirus-specific IgG antibodies identified in serum and cerebrospinal fluid of Patient 3 with high titers.
Delta activity with short alpha episodes.
other_tests.changes_over_time: August 2013: Low-voltage theta and delta activity; December 2013: Delta and theta activity.
